name: EMBERProgrammer
0:
”Alexa , turn on zone one”
”Alexa , set zone one to auto”
”Alexa ,set zone one to 24 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The EMBER Programmer Skill offers users a convenient way to control EMBER Programmer.

To connect your EMBER Programmer to the Alexa Skill, first use the EMBER App to connect your devices to the internet. Then open the Alexa App to find the EMBER Programmer Skill, enter the Skill and click the "ENABLE" button. The authentication page will pop up. Enter the username and password of the EMBER App. On completion, click Discover on your device. Alternatively you can say "Discover" to Alexa. After discovering the device, you will find the your EMBER device name in Alexa App.

You can now control your EMBER Programmer (name zone one)by speaking the following phrases to Alexa:

“Alexa, turn on zone one.”
“Alexa, turn off zone one .”
“Alexa, set zone one to auto.”
“Alexa, set zone one to 21 degrees.”
“Alexa, set zone one to 21 degrees for 1/2/3 hours.”
“Alexa, what is the temperature of zone one .”

You can check with your local reseller how to integrate the Alexa in you Home Manager system.
